name: Cheesy Chicken Layer Quesadilla Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: shredded chicken, black beans, corn, salsa, shredded cheese blend, large flour tortilla, sour cream, guacamole, salsa
recipeInstructionSteps: In a large pan over medium heat, cook the chicken, beans, corn, and salsa.
In a springform pan, lay down one tortilla, then top with chicken mixture and cheese.
Layer another tortilla on top and continue to stack until pan is full.
Bake for 30 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Top with sour cream, guacamole, and salsa.
